mapper.select: SELECT PG.*, NVL(CNT, 0) CNT FROM PUBLIC_GOODS PG LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT GOODS_NO, COUNT(NO) CNT FROM GOODS_RESERVATION GROUP BY GOODS_NO ) GR ON PG.NO = GR.GOODS_NO WHERE PG.DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT PP.*, NVL(CNT, 0) CNT FROM PUBLIC_PLACE PP LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PL_NO, COUNT(NO) CNT FROM PLACE_RESERVATION GROUP BY pl_no ) PR ON PP.NO = PR.PL_NO WHERE PP.DELETE_YN = 'N'
